revised_title: A Study on the Composition and Formation of Calculi in the Urinary System
tldr: The author examines various types of calculi (kidney stones) and their formation in the urinary system. They analyze the composition of calculi, including uric acid, ammoniaco-magnesian phosphate, and oxalate of lime, and discuss their properties and solubility. The study also highlights the differences in calculi formation in different parts of the urinary system and the effects of internal use of solvent medicines.
